name: House Of Gepeng
description:
Created For Game Jam+ Indonesia / USE FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

One day, Nala was playing around the haunted house of Mr. Gepeng and got lost inside and Mr. Gepeng's kindly helped Nala escape from his house, help them to reach their goal by completing puzzles! 

Play by yourself or with a friend with this simple multiplayer control!

  • Nala : Move [W,A,S,D] & Interact [E]
  • Mr. Gepeng : Move [Mouse Cursor] & Posses [LMB]
